subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Claudio Reyna, captain of the U.S. national team, strained a hamstring early in an exhibition game against Morocco and the match ended in a 1-0 defeat for the Americans.
snippet: Claudio Reyna, captain of the U.S. national team, strained a hamstring early in an exhibition game against Morocco and the match ended in a 1-0 defeat for the Americans.
